summary: Swashbuckling adventures of young army recruit Fanfan la Tulipe during the reign of King Louis XV in 18th Century France.
cast: Gérard Philipe|Gina Lollobrigida|Marcel Herrand|Olivier Hussenot|Henri Rollan|Nerio Bernardi|Jean-Marc Tennberg|Geneviève Page|Sylvie Pelayo|Lolita De Silva|Irène Young|Georgette Anys|Hennery|Lucien Callamand|Gil Delamare|Jackie Blanchot|Joé Davray|Gérard Buhr|Georges Demas|Jean Parédès|Noël Roquevert|Jean Debucourt|Harry-Max|Guy Henry|Hiram Sherman|Françoise Spira|Paul Violette
title: Fanfán el invencible
